description: Try our easy to follow Spaghetti With Ricotta, Lemon & Tuna recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Seafood pasta,Pescatarian,Tree nut free,Lemon,Low sugar,Sesame free,Zucchini,Fish,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Quick & easy lunch,Peanut free
name: Spaghetti With Ricotta, Lemon & Tuna Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 185g can, tuna in oil, drained, flaked

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pan of salted water to the boil. Add pasta and cook following packet directions. Drain, reserving 2 tbs cooking liquid.
Using a vegetable peeler, cut zucchini into long thin ribbons until you reach the seeds.
Cook peas in a medium saucepan of simmering water for 6 minutes. Add zucchini and cook for 30 seconds. Drain. Transfer to a large bowl.
Heat oil in a small saucepan over medium heat. Add 2 tbs of the capers and cook 1 minute or until capers open. Using a slotted spoon, transfer capers to a paper towel to drain excess oil.
Add garlic to oil and cook gently for 1 minute. Add the dill, parsley, lemon rind and juice, remaining capers and tuna. Cook for 23 minutes or until warmed through.

Combine zucchini, peas, hot pasta, tuna mixture and ricotta and toss gently. Add enough of the reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season. Serve pasta scattered with fried capers, parmesan and parsley leaves
